#summary Rule Functions > Item Type

= type( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments matches an items type

== Alias ==

  * `itemtype`

== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = item type

== Remarks ==

  * args must be in the clients language

  * an items type can be found on the debug info menu for that item

== Examples ==

  * `type( armor, weapon )`

  * `type( gem )`

  * `type( recipe )`
